events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but the delivery still hasn't arrived and the tracking info hasn't updated for days.
The issue was classified under Delivery Delay based on customer keywords regarding late shipping and tracking problems.
Assigning the case to delivery support team to investigate the delayed shipment and tracking issue.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your delayed package. I’m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have? This will help us locate the shipment.
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The tracking number provided is XYZ987654321 but it hasn’t updated since last week.
We have contacted the shipping carrier to clarify the status. Meanwhile, we can offer you a partial refund if the parcel does not arrive within the next 5 days.
Thank you for the update and offer. I appreciate you following up and will wait to see if it arrives within that timeframe.
The package was finally delivered today. We are glad the issue is resolved and apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Just checking in to ensure that your delivery was satisfactory and if you need any further assistance.
We are closing this case now but please reach out anytime if you have more questions or issues in the future.
